review_body: Wonderful hotel, situated in one of the best spots in NY, Columbus Circle, with great services and comfort! The hotel's bar / restaurant is a separate chapter: a happy point for a senior executive, serving the best old fashioned Big Apple!

Great escape from the city, beautifully appointed rooms that are comfortable, the bathrooms are like visiting a spa. Close to Central Park & great shopping. The staff goes above & beyond to make your stay memorable. This is luxury at its finest!

We dropped in for breakfast. Excellent service and glorious food in good size portions. Endless coffee and fruit juice. Superb range of menu and all beautifully presented. A very special family breakfast celebration for our daughterâ€™s 19th Birthday.
